## ThemeLoadOptions.resolveResourceUris property

Resolve the URIs to resources like fonts, icons, ... If true, \[\[uriResolver\]\] will be used to resolve the URI  true

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resolveResourceUris?: boolean;
```
